meeting_annotations.speaker: Jordi Cabana (UIC)
meeting_annotations.transcript: Welcome everybody. I'm Jordi Cabana from UIC and I'm going to be the facilitator for this discussion. I have a few business items that we're asked to cover. The first one is whether I can get a volunteer to be in charge of condensing the ideas into the PowerPoint.
meeting_annotations.other: The speaker is establishing his role as the facilitator and setting the initial agenda.

meeting_annotations.speaker: Marta Hatzell (GT)
meeting_annotations.other: She volunteers quickly by raising her hand and speaking up.

meeting_annotations.speaker: Jordi Cabana (UIC)
meeting_annotations.transcript: So, you'll see what it is. You you have did you find it?

meeting_annotations.speaker: Marta Hatzell (GT)
meeting_annotations.other: This is a collaborative interruption to confirm she has completed the requested task.

meeting_annotations.speaker: Jordi Cabana (UIC)
meeting_annotations.transcript: Because it took me it took me a couple of minutes to find. I was looking at the wrong folder. Okay, perfect. The second one is if you all open the... let me share my screen in case you can't find it. So if you all...
meeting_annotations.screenshare_content: Jordi Cabana initiates a screen share. The screen is black with a notification that reads "Jordi Cabana (UIC) has started screen sharing". No other content is visible yet.
meeting_annotations.other: The facilitator proactively shares his screen to prevent confusion and ensure everyone is looking at the same document.
